title: New & Video: Haleek Maul – Fraulein
body:
The Internet, combined with bedroom producing has made the age of modern artists decrease dramatically.

Rapper **[Haleek Maul](http://soundcloud.com/haleek-maul)** is 15 years old, that’s right, 15. I’ll give you a moment to feel thoroughly depressed.

Done? Good, because **Haleek**’s music is something to get really fucking excited about. Ethereal and vast, perhaps the only thing that can match the instrumentation in terms of scope is **Haleek**’s flows. For someone so young they’re dramatically mature, “All the rhymes and the sins and lies I’ve told/Maybe I’m a demon, I think you should maybe hide your soul/told me, said she like it, don’t need life no more/what’s life my doll?”.

Just, wow.

Stream the video by **[Jamie Harley](http://vimeo.com/user2751243)** below, featuring footage from the 1933 film _Lot in Sodom_, then check out **Haleek**’s earlier effort over a Clams Casino beat.
